name: Resist
storyline: A dystopian future. An authoritarian regime. A tale of violence, intrigue, and hope. Swing from towering skyscrapers and battle deadly enemies as you fight to free your city from the evil that consumes it. Will you bow to the forces of oppression? Or will you have the strength to Resist?
summary: Resist is a single-player action RPG designed exclusively for Quest. With a kinetic swinging system, intense combat, and a fully immersive story, Resist is the VR experience you’ve been waiting for.
